sessions.transcript: User: My PRN didn't generate. Bot: Please provide your TIN and confirm payment option. User: TIN: 100-234-567. Bot: The PRN generation failed with code 503. Agent escalated.
User: How do I reset my Touchpoint password? Bot: Visit ura.go.ug, click login, select Touchpoint, click forgot password...
User: I can't print logbook. Bot: Ensure PDF viewer is installed. If still failing, visit Ministry office. User: I tried, still fails.

faqs.question: How to generate PRN for payment?

recommended_docs.title: Reset Touchpoint Password
recommended_docs.excerpt: Steps to reset Touchpoint password and troubleshooting

recommended_docs.title: PRN Generation Guide
recommended_docs.excerpt: How to generate PRN for payments when logged in and when not logged in
